oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 1st Annual Mark Collie Celebrity Race for Diabetes Cure
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Racing; Collie, Mark; Brooks & Dunn (Musical group); Hill, Faith, 1967-; McGraw, Tim; Hiatt, John, 1952-; Mavericks (Musical group); Crook and Chase (Television program); Petty, Richard; Metal photoplates; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and orange on white) announcing the 1st Annual Mark Collie Celebrity Race for Diabetes Cure hosted by Mark Collie and featuring Brooks and Dunn, Faith Hill, Tim McGraw, John Hiatt, the Mavericks, Lorianne Crook and Charlie Chase, and Richard Petty at the Nashville Motor Speedway on October 13. Poster features a metal photoplate of Mark Collie and a woodcut of racing cars.
